title: Units Schema
description: Schema for units.json files containing unit definitions

Attributes.description: Key-value object containing attributes for the unit

BasicProfileIds.description: Array of profile IDs that define basic profiles for this unit. Usually just one basic profile

DefaultFront.description: Default front width for the unit formation

Formation.description: Id of the formation used by the unit: 0- Close formation, 1- Close formation with gap, 2-Lance formation (like a triangle), 3-Open Formation, 4-Open formation by default like a checkerboard
